author.bio:

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: sfrohne, foxite, experibass, lukginzis, stars_in_blue_major, asinineporcupine, no_chill, and *not* me.

guild.description:
Showcase your new, favourite or undiscovered Guilds.

---

##### Rules

**0\. [Site-wide rules apply](https://ruqqus.com/help/rules)**

---

**1\. Format post titles correctly**:

`+Guild_Name: short_description`.

---

**2\. [NSFW](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Not_safe_for_work) Guilds must be marked.**

Please tick the “NSFW?” box when **[creating a post](https://ruqqus.com/submit?guild=Guilds)**.

---

**3\. Meta posts relating to this Guild are allowed.**

Example: “[Meta] Something is missing from the sidebar”

---

**[View mod log](/+Guilds/mod/log)**
